author: costin
msg: A bit of refactoring - the method to convert was duplicated in the ant tasks
and few other places. Now it's in Registry - I'll add the other types
that are common ( OpenMBean level at least ).
Added first bits of code for mbean persistence. The "source" will be notified
of changes. We'll probably need to seaparate metadata source from mbeans

author: costin
msg: Few fixes to better deal with the case when the class is not available.
( this is very important for "virtual" mbeans or remote mbeans ).
Also fixed some other conditions that resulted in NPE

author: costin
msg: Add a default attribute for modeled mbeans - the type of the managed
resource. This is needed since no other consistent mechanism exists
( "code" would return BaseModelMBean ). This info is needed for remoting

author: costin
msg: Small bits of refactoring and fixes.
Added a method to allow reseting the metadata cache - in case we use
The right solution is to stop using the static fields.
